version_description:
- Solved issues related to location update for calculating speed and distance travelled.
- Enhanced stability of application.

- Solved issues related to location update for calculating speed and distance travelled.
- Enhanced stability of application.

- Solved minor issues and improvement in functionality.

Enhanced functionality and solved minor issue related to the settings part of the app
Enhanced functionality and solved minor issue related to the settings part of the app

- Complete new look with the classic design as we added great user interactive elements.
- New feature added to display current speed and distance along with the location on map.
- Now user can listen music in background along with the speedometer live tracking and current speed data display.
- Show current weather conditions for the current place.
- Provided landscape mode for digital display.
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Provided landscape mode for digital display.
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Improvement in functionality.

Thanks for using our app. We are very happy to see your valuable support to make this app as one of the best app on the Store.

We have shipped following features and fixes with the current update:

- A beautiful updated design, exclusive content and more.
- Added unlimited cloud storage for tracking data.
- Fixed an issue that was causing the app to crash at launch for some users. Our apologies for that! All fixed now.

Always keep sharing your feedback at apps@appaspecttechnologies.com, We go through each and every one of them and keep improving the app.
